item.title: Believe in Yourself
item.description: [[songs/s/stick_to_your_guns/diamond/empty_heads.md#but-youve-been-nowhere-and-youve-seen-nothing-vyl-wnanory|You were my hero, adore an altar I adorn with flowers]] [[songs/s/stick_to_your_guns/diamond/empty_heads.md#but-youve-been-nowhere-and-youve-seen-nothing-vyl-wnanory|You were my god, my guilded picture of my fantasy]] [[songs/s/stick_to_your_guns/diamond/empty_heads.

item.title: Never Go
item.description: [[songs/d/dead_by_april/dead_by_april/erased.md#hold-me-close-vyl-wnanory|Feel my heartbeat]] [[songs/d/dead_by_april/dead_by_april/erased.md#hold-me-close-vyl-wnanory|Your body is close to mine]] [[songs/d/dead_by_april/dead_by_april/erased.md#hold-me-close-vyl-wnanory|Hold on tightly]] [[songs/d/dead_by_april/dead_by_april/erased.md#hold-me-close-vyl-wnanory|Move in time]] [[songs/p/perturbator/i_am_the_night/naked_tongues_feat_memory_ghosts_isabella_goloversic.md#can-i-dare-say-vyl-wnanory|Together forever]] [[songs/p/perturbator/i_am_the_night/naked_tongues_feat_memory_ghosts_isabella_goloversic.md#can-i-dare-say-vyl-wnanory|Forever and a day]] [[songs/p/perturbator/i_am_the_night/naked_tongues_feat_memory_ghosts_isabella_goloversic.

item.title: Reach For The Stars
item.description: [[songs/b/boy_harsher/careful/the_look_you_gave_jerry.md#when-you-go-vyl-wnanory|When you are alone by yourself]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/careful/the_look_you_gave_jerry.md#when-you-go-vyl-wnanory|Reach for the stars and you will touch them]] [[songs/e/eminem/curtain_call/stan.md#and-when-you-dream-i-hope-you-cant-sleep-and-you-scream-about-it-vyl-wnanory|And the light of the dawn,]] [[songs/e/eminem/curtain_call/stan.

item.title: Torture
item.description: [[songs/d/deez_nuts/bout_it/shot_after_shot.md#we-live-a-life-of-excess-shit-thats-all-that-we-know-vyl-wnanory|When I see a black hole,]] [[songs/d/deez_nuts/bout_it/shot_after_shot.md#we-live-a-life-of-excess-shit-thats-all-that-we-know-vyl-wnanory|The chasm is here,]] [[songs/d/deez_nuts/bout_it/shot_after_shot.md#we-live-a-life-of-excess-shit-thats-all-that-we-know-vyl-wnanory|The chasm is nowhere]] [[songs/d/deez_nuts/bout_it/shot_after_shot.md#we-live-a-life-of-excess-shit-thats-all-that-we-know-vyl-wnanory|And you go one step further,]] [[songs/d/deez_nuts/bout_it/shot_after_shot.

item.title: When I Think About You
item.description: [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/methadone.md#what-will-it-take-for-you-to-notice-vyl-wnanory|We stay together, together in my dream,]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/methadone.md#what-will-it-take-for-you-to-notice-vyl-wnanory|When we were closer love was to be seen]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/methadone.md#what-will-it-take-for-you-to-notice-vyl-wnanory|Yeah I can feel you, hear your distant voice,]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/methadone.
